\w Is|strong="G3588"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w divided|strong="G3307"\w*? \w Was|strong="G3588"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*? \w Were|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* baptized \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G3686"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*?

Brothers, consider \w the|strong="G2596"\w* time \w of|strong="G2596"\w* \w your|strong="G3588"\w* \w calling|strong="G2821"\w*: \w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w of|strong="G2596"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w wise|strong="G4680"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w human|strong="G4561"\w* standards; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w powerful|strong="G1415"\w*; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G2596"\w* \w noble|strong="G2104"\w* birth.

Therefore, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w it|strong="G2531"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*: “\w Let|strong="G2443"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w boasts|strong="G2744"\w* \w boast|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.”
